summary:
Venture out, reliably and hassle-free!

You need more than services - you need a team.

As an experienced international business lawyer and entrepreneur, brought up in Germany by a Dutch father and a Swedish mother, I have successfully supported numerous foreign companies to the Netherlands, Sweden, Germany and other countries in Europe. 

At DolkHesper, we provide comprehensive solutions that go beyond traditional services. We offer a dedicated and scalable team that becomes an integral part of your business, ensuring seamless coordination and expert guidance. From setting up your company and managing bookkeeping and financial administration to getting expert advice on VAT registration, tax compliance, payroll, HR, and legal matters, we are here to support you every step of the way.

Let's connect and explore how our team can work with yours to navigate the complexities of international business and achieve your expansion goals.

Feel free to call, happy to help! +31 20 250 2333
